aboutText: An energetic group of diverse volunteers, passionate about saving the flying foxes population and all bats of Far North Queensland!

members.name: Maree Treadwell Kerr
members.title: President, Head Bat
members.desc: Maree,  is an ecologist and wildlife communicator, and has been active in flying-fox conservation and community education for over 30 years with a particular interest in bat tourism.

members.name: Hilary Whitehouse
members.title: Vice President, Wise Bat
members.desc: Associate Professor Hilary Whitehouse is an expert in climate change and sustainability education. She began direct involvement with flying-foxes during the heat stress event of 2018, where 23,000 flying-foxes died.

members.name: Sera Steves
members.title: Secretary, Secretary Bat
members.desc: Sera grew up with bat conservation in USA and brought this experience to Australia. She is an ecologist and ethologist with experience in delivering wildlife presentations and chairs the Spectacled Flying-fox Recovery Team.

members.name: Brynn Mathews
members.title: Treasurer
members.desc: Brynn has an extensive background in conservation advocacy< He has been involved in saving the SFF over many years  and brings legal expertise and local knowledge to the team.

members.name: Rebecca Koller
members.title: Flying-fox Coordinator
members.desc: Rebecca is a wildlife artist and the key flying-fox carer in the Cairns region, managing rehabilitation and release of orphaned and injured flying-foxes. She works closely with the bat hospitals and wildlife care groups mentoring and training new carers.

members.name: Gaby Schierenbeck
members.title: BatSoc committee member
members.desc: Gaby  has been involved in flying-fox rescue for over ten years and has the keenest eyes and ears for orphaned flying-foxes needing care.

members.name: Larni Gryphon
members.title: BatSoc committee member
members.desc: Lar Ni is the newest member of the BatSoc team and is a long term volunteer with CAFNEC and campaigns for climate change action and wildlife conservation.

members.name: Heather Owen
members.title: BatSoc committee member
members.desc: Heather has been involved in spectacled flying-fox advocacy and care for over 10 years and is our specialty carer for premature and newborn orphaned pups.
